comments.raw_text: Right now the `filter_expression` defined on Remote Settings experiment recipes is being processed by both `RemoteSettings` and `ASRouterTargeting` (via the RemoteSettingsExperimentLoader). This isn't ideal – we should probably rename this field to prevent conflicts or stop using `ASRouterTargeting` for filtering.
